諦めがつく: (あきらめがつく) - to give up; to accept (defeat, etc.)
諦めが付く: (あきらめがつく) - to give up; to accept (defeat, etc.)
諦めつく: (あきらめつく) - to give up; to accept (defeat, etc.)
諦める: (akirameru) - to give up, to abandon (esperança, planos), to resign oneself (to)
諦念: (ていねん) - understanding and acceptance; spiritual awakening; a heart that understands truth; (feeling of) resignation
諦観: (teikan) - visão clara, resignação (no sentido de se conformar)
諧声: (かいせい) - vocal harmony; harmonious voice; harmonious voices
諧謔を弄する: (かいぎゃくをろうする) - to crack jokes
諫め: (いさめ) - remonstrance; remonstration; admonition; protest; reproof; expostulation; advice; counsel
諫める: (いさめる) - to remonstrate; to warn not to do something
諫死: (かんし) - committing suicide (to remonstrate or dissuade one's lord); preparing to die in an effort to dissuade one's lord
諫臣: (かんしん) - retainer who dares to dissuade his lord
諭す: (さとす) - to admonish; to persuade; to warn; to remonstrate
諭旨: (ゆし) - official suggestion; official advice; official instruction
諭旨免職: (ゆしめんしょく) - resignation under instruction
諮問事項: (しもんじこう) - terms of reference
諮問委員会: (しもんいいんかい) - advisory committee (council, panel)
諮問機関: (しもんきかん) - consultative body; advisory committee; advisory organ
諮詢: (しじゅん) - question; enquiry; inquiry; consultation; advice-seeking
諮詢機関: (しじゅんきかん) - consultative body; advisory committee; advisory organ; advisory body
諱む: (いむ) - to avoid/to refrain from/to shun; (忌む, 諱む only) to detest
諳んじる: (そらんじる) - to memorize; to memorise; to recite from memory
諳記: (あんき) - memorization; memorisation; learning by heart
諳誦: (あんしょう) - recitation; reciting from memory
諷する: (ふうする) - to hint; to insinuate; to satirize; to satirise
諷喩: (ふうゆ) - hint; insinuation; indirect suggestion; allegory
諷諌: (ふうかん) - indirect remonstrance; exhortation by insinuation
諷諫: (ふうかん) - indirect remonstrance; exhortation by insinuation
諸々: (moromoro) - todo tipo de coisas, várias coisas, grande número de pessoas
諸に: (もろに) - completely; all the way; altogether; bodily
諸事万端: (しょじばんたん) - (yoji) everything; all things
諸元: (しょげん) - various factors or elements
諸元表: (じょげんぴょう) - specification table; specification sheet
諸兄: (しょけい) - dear friends; (all of) you or those men
諸処: (しょしょ) - here and there; everywhere
諸刃: (moroha) - afiado dos dois lados; lâmina de dois gumes
諸君: (shokun) - vocês (pessoas); senhores, senhoras e senhores, meus amigos, todos
諸味: (もろみ) - main fermenting mash (in production of sake or soy sauce)/unrefined sake or soy sauce; unrefined (sake, soy sauce, etc.)/rough
諸問題: (しょもんだい) - many problems; various problems
諸国: (shokoku) - vários países, várias regiões, várias províncias
諸国漫遊: (しょこくまんゆう) - (yoji) tour round the country (Japan) (visiting from province to province)
諸天: (しょてん) - various deities; the gods
諸子: (モロコ) - gudgeon (any fish of genus Gnathopogon or related genera); willow gudgeon (Gnathopogon caerulescens); longtooth grouper (species of fish, Epinephelus bruneus)
諸子百家: (しょしひゃっか) - (yoji) Hundred Schools of Thought; general term for the large number of scholars and controversialists, and their respective schools, that flourished during China's Spring and Autumn period and Warring States period
諸家: (しょか) - various families; various schools of thought
諸尊: (しょそん) - various buddhas, bodhisattvas, deities, etc.
諸島: (しょとう) - archipelago; group of islands
諸差し: (もろざし) - {sumo} deep double underarm grip which prevents the opponent from grabbing the belt

諸悪: (しょあく) - every (kind of) evil or crime
諸所: (しょしょ) - here and there; everywhere
諸政: (しょせい) - political affairs; all phases of government
諸条件: (しょじょうけん) - terms and conditions
諸法: (しょほう) - all existing things (formed and formless)
